reviewText: This is a great program and an excellent introduction to the world of wine. The program's host, Janice Robinson is a leading authority on wine and the first women to hold the prestigous Master of Wine designation. This was originally produced for the BBC. I remember seeing it on PBS a few years ago.
This is nothing more than a collection of early 80's documentary film clips. Poor quality, poor content. It reminds me of an old public TV special.
